name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.2-6f5d0324211587a001e76b86ae4952590b8cd2c2 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
